$BTC update

I was bullish short-term from $40k because there were possibilities of reaching $50k. It just got hit. Now what?

I'm expecting a rejection of $BTC from the $50k level while alts keep pumping more, forming a divergence. After that, the entire market should reverse. https://t.co/5JLTekUk8T

In this latest SAV explainer, Varuna Shankar takes a closer look at the Sri Lanka-Japan relationship. She argues that Japan is a key player in countering Chinese influence in the island nation and aiding it out of its economic crisis.

#altcoins 

Currently testing a major support. 5th wave of C is missing, and the main resistance hasn't been reached yet. Also most altcoins look like they want a last high, that's why I have added some exposure to alts (30%)

Last leg up, then full reversal to new lows. https://t.co/dGrQEHvB2J

$BTC plan 

After the other's day sell-off, fundings got reset and the price formed a ltf bottom pattern. There's a lot of liquidity above the last high, so 50k is still possible before reversal.

Also, altcoins look like they are going to pump.

Ltf bullish. Then bearish again. https://t.co/YQ5xkkUI7k

Update.

$BTC reached 48k-50k and $ETH 2500-2600. 

A last pump to 50k is possible. Then $BTC should go sideways while altcoins pump more (money flowing to low caps). After a few days, the entire market should reverse and dump. https://t.co/H5s4m0VI40
Thoughts for the next few days. https://t.co/J2EzTZtg6N

2023 has been a challenging year. The main analysis didn't go as planned, and it seemed like everything and everyone was against us. But despite this, we kept a cool head and remained true to our principles. It was a year full of lessons; the most important being to have patienceâ€¦

I know that these last weeks/months, most people have increased the value of their portfolios and Iâ€™m happy about it. For my part, Iâ€™m just being faithful to my analysis, always respecting the work of others and dedicating hundreds of hours to make a macro analysis of the wholeâ€¦ https://t.co/PH391igjog

$BNB

I have been posting updates on Telegram all year. Every addition to the short position, the reasons why...

PA, heatmaps, OI and fundings very similar to $FTT or $LUNA before the crash.

The main move hasn't happened yet.

My thesis during this year has been that the move from the lows has been a bear market rally, mostly manipulated by the same people, in order to make everyone believe the bull market has already started. 

The truth is coming out little by little. The CFTC already alleged thisâ€¦ https://t.co/B3jxv0P8qd
The beginning of the end.

Congratulations to the bulls that were respectful and were calling for 30k.

My bearish scenario is NOT invalidated yet.

"All good things come to those who wait."

Happy weekend and Easter to everyone!
Where there's smoke, there's fire. Where there's a lot of smoke...

The longer the bear market rally, the more aggressive the drop will be.

Soon.

Despite all the noise, I know that the vast majority of those who follow me are genuine and good people. And these deserve an update:

This time away from Twitter has been very good and necessary. I'm totally fine, enjoying my personal life. Thank you to everyone who has shownâ€¦

Some thoughts.

I'll continue to ignore the noise after this. https://t.co/B4MFV2Bawb
No changes. I'm not buying.

For those wondering: I'm totally fine. Just disconnecting from all the Twitter negativity and focusing on charts/enjoying life. There's no point tweeting when there's no change.

And yes, still short and strong. Interesting week ahead.

I've been checking charts all this time, avoiding noise from Twitter. The way the upward movement is happening, the way htf resistances are being tested... it clearly looks manipulated, no real demand.

Once again, the biggest bull trap I've ever seen. But they won't trap me.
Still short and strong.
One of the biggest bull traps I've ever seen.

Is the market bouncing higher than expected? Yes.
Is the expected capitulation taking long? Yes.

Is the bearish scenario invalidated? NO.

If you have made profits during this bounce, congratulations, but buying here is a big mistake, in my opinion. 

Again, I'm not buying.

Good morning. 

No changes. https://t.co/EMJiVZtBJh
